quest.name: A Strange New Moon
journal:
 Quest Sync
Recordingway needs to gather more data.
objectives: Slay a thinker and obtain a fungal filament.
Deliver the fungal filament to Recordingway.

dialogue.name: RECORDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Curses! Insufficient data, even after everything I've done.

dialogue.name: RECORDINGWAY
dialogue.text: You! Livingway told me about you. Would you mind lending me a hand?

dialogue.name: RECORDINGWAY
dialogue.text: As you know, we Loporrits only awakened recently. While we were sleeping, Mare Lamentorum has undergone a number of bewildering changes, one of those being the appearance of strange walking fungi─thinkers, we call them.

dialogue.name: RECORDINGWAY
dialogue.text: An Allagan vessel crashed here many years ago, you see, and some part of it pierced through the wall of our underground bioplant. I believe the spores from within eventually made their way to the surface of the moon, where they went on to mutate and evolve in our absence.

dialogue.name: RECORDINGWAY
dialogue.text: I mean to study these curious new life-forms, but I need more data before I can draw any real conclusions. Would you be willing to retrieve a sample of fungal filaments for me? Yes, a single sample would more than suffice.

dialogue.name: RECORDINGWAY
dialogue.text: If I remember my culture studies correctly, you will expect some form of payment in exchange for services rendered, yes? Bring me that filament, and I will see you are duly compensated.

dialogue.name: RECORDINGWAY
dialogue.text: A single sample of fungal filament is all I need to begin my work.

dialogue.name: RECORDINGWAY
dialogue.text: I was starting to wonder if the thinkers had done you in. Were you able to retrieve a sample?

dialogue.name: RECORDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Excellent! I'll get to work analyzing it right away.

dialogue.name: RECORDINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...Hm? Why, the structure of this filament is altogether different from the fungi growing in the bioplant.

dialogue.name: RECORDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Mayhap the spores mixed with substances leaked from the Allagan ship. Chimera incubation fluid, perhaps? In any case, this isn't good. Any and all potential threats must be eliminated if we are to make the moon fit for inhabitation.

dialogue.name: RECORDINGWAY
dialogue.text: You have helped with a most important discovery, and for that, you have my thanks. Here─your reward, as promised.
